## Libraries
 
```{r load libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```
  
## Load Data 

```{r}
libcal <- read_html("https://api3.libcal.com/api_events.php?iid=971&m=upc&cid=3819&c=&d=25858&l=50&target=_blank")
```

## Exlpore

```{r}
libcal

str(libcal)

class(libcal)

libcal
```


### Example of a table
```{r}
libcal %>% 
  html_nodes("table") %>% 
  .[[3]] %>% # the 3rd table in the feed
  html_table() %>% 
  select(X2) # select the 2nd variable

libcal %>% 
  html_nodes("table") %>% 
  .[[3]] %>% # the 3rd table in the feed
  html_table() %>% 
  select(X1)


libcal %>% 
  html_nodes("table") %>% 
  .[[3]] %>% # the 3rd table in the feed
  html_table() %>% 
  filter(X1 == "Title:") %>% 
  select(X2)

libcal %>% 
  html_nodes("table") %>% 
  .[[3]] %>% # the 3rd table in the feed
  html_table() %>% 
  gather(X2)

```
